scripts.build: node script/barrelize.js && node script/generate-version.js && npm run red && npm run tsc:src && npm run tsc:guides && npm run copy
scripts.build:release: npm run build && npm run lint && npm run check && npm run doc && npm run test:retry
scripts.test:glob: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=test/tsconfig.json TS_NODE_CACHE=false nyc mocha --stack-trace-limit=1000  --async-stack-traces -v -r esm -rv ts-node/register --
scripts.test:retry: (npm run test:fast || npm run test:fast || npm run test:fast || npm run test:fast || npm run test:fast)
scripts.test:integration-audio: cd ./integration/js && npm run test -- integration audio
scripts.test:integration-video: cd ./integration/js && npm run test -- integration video
scripts.test:integration-video-test-app: cd ./integration/js && npm run test -- integration video_test_app
scripts.test:integration-meeting-end: cd ./integration/js && npm run test -- integration meeting_end
scripts.test:integration-content-share-test-suit: cd ./integration/js && npm run test -- integration content_share_test_suite_one
cd ./integration/js && npm run test -- integration content_share_test_suite_two
scripts.test:integration-data-message: cd ./integration/js && npm run test -- integration data_message
scripts.test:integration-meeting-readiness-check: cd ./integration/js && npm run test -- integration meeting_readiness_checker
scripts.test:integration-messaging: cd ./integration/js && npm run test -- integration messaging
scripts.test:integration-transcription: cd ./integration/js && npm run test -- integration transcription
scripts.test:integration-background-blur: cd ./integration/js && npm run test -- integration background_blur
scripts.test:integration-echo-reduction: cd ./integration/js && npm run test -- integration echo_reduction
scripts.test:browser-compatibility-audio: cd ./integration/js && npm run test -- browser_compatibility audio
scripts.test:browser-compatibility-video: cd ./integration/js && npm run test -- browser_compatibility video
scripts.test:browser-compatibility-content-share: cd ./integration/js && npm run test -- browser_compatibility content_share
scripts.test:browser-compatibility-data-message: cd ./integration/js && npm run test -- browser_compatibility data_message
scripts.test:browser-compatibility-meeting-readi: cd ./integration/js && npm run test -- browser_compatibility meeting_readiness_checker
scripts.test:browser-compatibility-background-bl: cd ./integration/js && npm run test -- browser_compatibility background_blur
scripts.test:browser-compatibility-voice-focus: cd ./integration/js && npm run test -- browser_compatibility voice_focus
scripts.test:linux-browser-compatibility-audio: cd ./integration/js && npm run test -- browser_compatibility linux_audio
scripts.test:linux-browser-compatibility-video: cd ./integration/js && npm run test -- browser_compatibility linux_video
scripts.test:linux-browser-compatibility-content: cd ./integration/js && npm run test -- browser_compatibility linux_content_share
scripts.test:linux-browser-compatibility-other: cd ./integration/js && npm run test -- browser_compatibility linux_other
